description: This file defines a class ResendTools that provides email sending capabilities using the Resend API, including initialization with API key and email parameters, and a method to send emails with error handling.

classes.name: ResendTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for sending emails via the Resend API, initialized with API key and sender email, with a method to send emails.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the ResendTools instance with optional API key and sender email, sets up the tools list, and calls the superclass initializer.

methods.name: send_email
methods.description: Sends an email using the Resend API, returning success or error message based on the outcome.
